reqs:
This is a WAITLIST section for FIST 332 Section 99A. Once you have registered in the waitlist there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available.
NOT OFFERED 2017W
This section of the course is ONLINE- distance education. Your instructor and course support staff will contact you by email prior to and during the course. Please ensure you have a valid email account. You will need your Campus Wide Login (CWL) to login to your course at https://www.elearning.ubc.ca/ . Course materials must be ordered online from University Readers http://www.universityreaders.com.


More information can be found under Distance Learning at : http://ctlt.ubc.ca/


Where applicable, please visit this site for examination information: http://www.students.ubc.ca/coursesreg/exams/


If this section is FULL or BLOCKED, please register in the WAITLIST section, FIST 332 - WL1.

The course topic is Irish Cinema and Culture.
description: A seminar examining one or more genres or periods, such as the Western, Film Noir, Science Fiction, Films of the 1980's. Also includes study of national cinemas.
